name: Xenon (itch) (NickHenley)
description:
Explore short flashes of memories through this first-person experience.

Made for Ludum Dare 51: "Every 10 Seconds". 

CONTROLS:

-Mouse to look

-WASD to move

-Spacebar to start

AI-generated art created with Dream by Wombo: https://www.wombo.art/

Static sound effect sourced from Mixkit: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/
